unwahanse wiwidha kshethrayan wenuwen karana lada sewawan ha shasanika sewawan agayamin malwathu parshawaye karaka sangha sabhawa mangin saddharma kirthi shri pawarakiththi gaurawa namaya sahitha galla, kadawath sathara ha thalpepaththuwe pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka padawiya 2007 okthombar masa 07 dina di pirinamana ladi.akmimana shasanarakshaka bala mandalaye pradhana lekhakadhikari, thalgasyaya siri pawarakiththi daham pasale pradhanacharya, samastha lanka keshara sinha sanwidhanaye sabhapathi akmimana, podu sewa sangamaye sabhapathi, thalgasyaya sa.na.sa sangamaye sabhapathi, karapitiya shikshana rohale karaka sabhika ha sabhapathi dhurayan athulu samaja sanwidhana rasaka nayakathwaya ha anushasaka washayen katayuthu karanu labathi.nahimiyange aagamika, samajika ha sanskruthika sewawan agayamin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathindun wisin araliyagaha mandiraye di upahara uthsawayak 2007 di pawathwa upahara thilinayak da pradanaya karana ladi.
